comment: üíê You earned it.  You chose Blake
post_caption: Colleen Hoover says the legal battle between Justin Baldoni and Blake Lively has tainted how she feels about her novel, 'It Ends With Us.' "I can't even recommend it anymore. I feel like [the lawsuit] has overshadowed it," the author tells ELLE magazine. "I'm almost embarrassed to say I wrote it." "When people ask what I do, I'm just like, 'I'm a writer. Please don't ask me what I wrote.'" Colleen will be deposed for the case in a few weeks and says that Blake and Justin's ongoing conflict "feels like a circus" and is "all-around sad." "This actually truly has impacted some of the actors' careers in huge ways... I'm just trying to stay removed from the negativity. I have my own story I could tell ‚Ä¶ but I don't want to bring attention to it, and I don't want to have to put someone else down to lift myself up."

I feel like [the lawsuit] has overshadowed it," the author tells ELLE magazine. "I'm almost embarrassed to say I wrote it." "When people ask what I do, I'm just like, 'I'm a writer. Please don't ask me what I wrote.'" Colleen will be deposed for the case in a few weeks and says that Blake and Justin's ongoing conflict "feels like a circus" and is "all-around sad." "This actually truly has impacted some of the actors' careers in huge ways... I'm just trying to stay removed from the negativity. I have my own story I could tell ‚Ä¶ but I don't want to bring attention to it, and I don't want to have to put someone else down to lift myself up."

I feel like [the lawsuit] has overshadowed it," the author tells ELLE magazine. "I'm almost embarrassed to say I wrote it." "When people ask what I do, I'm just like, 'I'm a writer. Please don't ask me what I wrote.'" Colleen will be deposed for the case in a few weeks and says that Blake and Justin's ongoing conflict "feels like a circus" and is "all-around sad." "This actually truly has impacted some of the actors' careers in huge ways... I'm just trying to stay removed from the negativity. I have my own story I could tell ‚Ä¶ but I don't want to bring attention to it, and I don't want to have to put someone else down to lift myself up."

I feel like [the lawsuit] has overshadowed it," the author tells ELLE magazine. "I'm almost embarrassed to say I wrote it." "When people ask what I do, I'm just like, 'I'm a writer. Please don't ask me what I wrote.'" Colleen will be deposed for the case in a few weeks and says that Blake and Justin's ongoing conflict "feels like a circus" and is "all-around sad." "This actually truly has impacted some of the actors' careers in huge ways... I'm just trying to stay removed from the negativity. I have my own story I could tell ‚Ä¶ but I don't want to bring attention to it, and I don't want to have to put someone else down to lift myself up."

Please don't ask me what I wrote.'" Colleen will be deposed for the case in a few weeks and says that Blake and Justin's ongoing conflict "feels like a circus" and is "all-around sad." "This actually truly has impacted some of the actors' careers in huge ways... I'm just trying to stay removed from the negativity. I have my own story I could tell ‚Ä¶ but I don't want to bring attention to it, and I don't want to have to put someone else down to lift myself up."

Please don't ask me what I wrote.'" Colleen will be deposed for the case in a few weeks and says that Blake and Justin's ongoing conflict "feels like a circus" and is "all-around sad." "This actually truly has impacted some of the actors' careers in huge ways... I'm just trying to stay removed from the negativity. I have my own story I could tell ‚Ä¶ but I don't want to bring attention to it, and I don't want to have to put someone else down to lift myself up."

Please don't ask me what I wrote.'" Colleen will be deposed for the case in a few weeks and says that Blake and Justin's ongoing conflict "feels like a circus" and is "all-around sad." "This actually truly has impacted some of the actors' careers in huge ways... I'm just trying to stay removed from the negativity. I have my own story I could tell ‚Ä¶ but I don't want to bring attention to it, and I don't want to have to put someone else down to lift myself up."

Please don't ask me what I wrote.'" Colleen will be deposed for the case in a few weeks and says that Blake and Justin's ongoing conflict "feels like a circus" and is "all-around sad." "This actually truly has impacted some of the actors' careers in huge ways... I'm just trying to stay removed from the negativity. I have my own story I could tell ‚Ä¶ but I don't want to bring attention to it, and I don't want to have to put someone else down to lift myself up."

Please don't ask me what I wrote.'" Colleen will be deposed for the case in a few weeks and says that Blake and Justin's ongoing conflict "feels like a circus" and is "all-around sad." "This actually truly has impacted some of the actors' careers in huge ways... I'm just trying to stay removed from the negativity. I have my own story I could tell ‚Ä¶ but I don't want to bring attention to it, and I don't want to have to put someone else down to lift myself up."

Please don't ask me what I wrote.'" Colleen will be deposed for the case in a few weeks and says that Blake and Justin's ongoing conflict "feels like a circus" and is "all-around sad." "This actually truly has impacted some of the actors' careers in huge ways... I'm just trying to stay removed from the negativity. I have my own story I could tell ‚Ä¶ but I don't want to bring attention to it, and I don't want to have to put someone else down to lift myself up."
